title: I was wondering...
body:
The whole point of having boards is to discus sh%t about the game in hopefully a constructive manner, so lets go a little off guidelines for that and share the funniest league content you care to find on the internet.

Gif's
Youtube 
Memes
Anything really

Ill start it off but remember, keep it pg 13 guys
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yRzF_gi0SOg&list=LLMrejCxwkOWysM7_jEU84fg&index=44

replies.body: Is this meme dank enough for this thread?
